actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Elkhorn makes two Dagger or +1 Longsword attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) piercing damage. If the target is a creature that is Large or bigger, it takes an extra 5 (1d10 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: +1 Longsword
entries: Melee atk  +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8 damage) slashing damage, or 5 (1d10 damage) slashing damage when used with two hands. If the target is a creature that is Large or bigger, it takes an extra 5 (1d10 damage) slashing damage.
